parameters.query:
-- ê¸°ì¡´ ë°ì´í„°ì™€ ì¤‘ë³µë˜ì§€ ì•Šë„ë¡ ì„ì‹œ í…Œì´ë¸” ì‚¬ìš©
CREATE TEMP TABLE temp_training_data AS
SELECT 
    b.broadcast_start_timestamp::DATE as broadcast_date,
    EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp)::INTEGER as hour,
    CASE EXTRACT(DOW FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp)
        WHEN 0 THEN 'ì¼' WHEN 1 THEN 'ì›”' WHEN 2 THEN 'í™”'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'ìˆ˜' WHEN 4 THEN 'ëª©' WHEN 5 THEN 'ê¸ˆ' WHEN 6 THEN 'í† '
    END as day_of_week,
    CASE 
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) BETWEEN 0 AND 5 THEN 'ìƒˆë²½'
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) BETWEEN 6 AND 11 THEN 'ì˜¤ì „'
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) BETWEEN 12 AND 17 THEN 'ì˜¤í›„'
        WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) BETWEEN 18 AND 23 THEN 'ì €ë…'
    END as time_slot,
    CASE 
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (3, 4, 5) THEN 'ë´„'
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (6, 7, 8) THEN 'ì—¬ë¦„'
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (9, 10, 11) THEN 'ê°€ì„'
        WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (12, 1, 2) THEN 'ê²¨ìš¸'
    END as season,
    EXTRACT(DOW FROM b.broadcast_start_timestamp) IN (0, 6) as is_weekend,
    g.product_code, g.product_name, g.category_main, g.category_middle, g.category_sub,
    g.price, g.brand, g.product_type, b.product_is_new,
    t.tape_code, t.tape_name,
    w.weather, w.temperature, w.precipitation,
    CASE WHEN h.holiday_date IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END as is_holiday,
    h.holiday_name, b.gross_profit, b.sales_efficiency
FROM TAIBROADCASTS b
INNER JOIN TAIPGMTAPE t ON b.tape_code = t.tape_code
INNER JOIN TAIGOODS g ON t.product_code = g.product_code
LEFT JOIN taiweather_daily w ON b.broadcast_start_timestamp::DATE = w.weather_date
LEFT JOIN TAIHOLIDAYS h ON b.broadcast_start_timestamp::DATE = h.holiday_date
WHERE b.broadcast_start_timestamp >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day';

-- ê¸°ì¡´ ë°ì´í„°ì™€ ì¤‘ë³µ ì œê±° í›„ ì‚½ì…
INSERT INTO broadcast_training_dataset (
    broadcast_date, hour, day_of_week, time_slot, season, is_weekend,
    product_code, product_name, category_main, category_middle, category_sub,
    price, brand, product_type, product_is_new,
    tape_code, tape_name,
    weather, temperature, precipitation,
    is_holiday, holiday_name, gross_profit, sales_efficiency
)
SELECT * FROM temp_training_data
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM broadcast_training_dataset btd
    WHERE btd.tape_code = temp_training_data.tape_code
      AND btd.broadcast_date = temp_training_data.broadcast_date
      AND btd.hour = temp_training_data.hour
);

DROP TABLE temp_training_data;
